scripts.dev: concurrently -c "#93c5fd,#c4b5fd" "cd apps/client && bun run dev" "cd apps/server && bun run dev" --names="client,server" --kill-others-on-fail
scripts.build: bun run build:shared && bun run build:client && bun run build:server
scripts.start: concurrently -c "#93c5fd,#c4b5fd" "cd apps/client && bun run preview" "cd apps/server && bun run start" --names="client,server" --kill-others-on-fail
scripts.clean: bun run clean:deps && bun run clean:dist
scripts.type-check: cd packages/shared && bun run type-check && cd ../../apps/client && bun run type-check && cd ../server && bun run type-check
